data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iqwadPIsYSEQ7kNvgE8er2Z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=A0pXx8Pv2TNZGnLfQLO5b2c&oh=00_AYAOPqN3T-Ltm--ytqva9r_JmdZLTd307WiIYaWhWtK2Qg&oe=66B0B5B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TNxv9oB5eI8Q7kNvgFfaqFU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=A0pXx8Pv2TNZGnLfQLO5b2c&oh=00_AYAp6iwIBd8HZbD8ft9jCU4FWMMY1CxwX9ehGoaxnvtdpA&oe=66B0C352)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CDd1edrxMJcQ7kNvgED1xMf&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=A0pXx8Pv2TNZGnLfQLO5b2c&oh=00_AYDq6qTKWvuXQpgu6iko-hK_5w_KxMItJzDaskOSchTy9g&oe=66B0AE89)
